languages.text: {n}В голосе Маражая нет ни единой подчеркнутой или игривой нотки — он говорит с вами тем же надменным тоном, который вы слышали еще на Грантисе.{/n} "Когда-то ты захотел{mf||а} познать запретное — пути истинных наследников древних эльдар. То, что составляет мой мир. То, что обычным мон-кай недоступно. То, что доставило бы удовольствие мне. И, должен сказать, ты отвратительно справляешься".

{n}Marazhai's voice is utterly devoid of colour and playfulness — he has reverted to the same imperious tone you heard back on Grantis.{/n} "You once wanted to gain forbidden knowledge — the paths of the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The essence of my world. Things that are inaccessible to ordinary mon-keigh. Things that bring me pleasure. And, I must say, you have proved to be an abominably poor student."
languages.original_text: {n}В голосе Маражая нет ни единой подчеркнутой или игривой нотки — он говорит с вами тем же надменным тоном, который вы слышали еще на Грантисе.{/n} "Когда-то ты захотел{mf||а} познать запретное — пути истинных наследников древних эльдар. То, что составляет мой мир. То, что обычным мон-кай недоступно. То, что доставило бы удовольствие мне. И, должен сказать, ты отвратительно справляешься".

The essence of my world. Things that are inaccessible to ordinary mon-keigh. Things that bring me pleasure. And, I must say, you have proved to be an abominably poor student."

The essence of my world. Things that are inaccessible to ordinary mon-keigh. Things that bring me pleasure. And, I must say, you have proved to be an abominably poor student."

{n}Marazhai's voice is utterly devoid of colour and playfulness — he has reverted to the same imperious tone you heard back on Grantis.{/n} "You once wanted to gain forbidden knowledge — the paths of the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The essence of my world. Things that are inaccessible to ordinary mon-keigh. Things that bring me pleasure. And, I must say, you have proved to be an abominably poor student."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的声音中完全没有任何感情，也没有一丝嬉笑的意味，再次恢复了之前在格兰蒂斯时那种咄咄逼人的语气。{/n}“你曾打算获得禁忌的知识，渴望踏上远古艾达灵族真正继承者的道路。你想要了解我的世界，触及普通的猴子根本无法触及的东西，感受那些会给我带来快乐的东西。而我不得不说，你这个学生的表现，实在是差得令我感到厌恶。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's voice is utterly devoid of colour and playfulness — he has reverted to the same imperious tone you heard back on Grantis.{/n} "You once wanted to gain forbidden knowledge — the paths of the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The essence of my world. Things that are inaccessible to ordinary mon-keigh. Things that bring me pleasure. And, I must say, you have proved to be an abominably poor student."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的声音中完全没有任何感情，也没有一丝嬉笑的意味，再次恢复了之前在格兰蒂斯时那种咄咄逼人的语气。{/n}“你曾打算获得禁忌的知识，渴望踏上远古艾达灵族真正继承者的道路。你想要了解我的世界，触及普通的猴子根本无法触及的东西，感受那些会给我带来快乐的东西。而我不得不说，你这个学生的表现，实在是差得令我感到厌恶。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの声には色も楽しい気持ちもまったくなく、グランティスのときと同じ横柄な口調に戻っていた。{/n}「お前は以前禁じられた知識…古代アエルダリの真の継承者の道を知りたいと言っていたな。俺の世界の本質だ。普通のモン＝ケイには触れられない。俺を悦ばせてくれるもの。こう言わないといけないらしい…お前はひどく劣った教え子だよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's voice is utterly devoid of colour and playfulness — he has reverted to the same imperious tone you heard back on Grantis.{/n} "You once wanted to gain forbidden knowledge — the paths of the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The essence of my world. Things that are inaccessible to ordinary mon-keigh. Things that bring me pleasure. And, I must say, you have proved to be an abominably poor student."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの声には色も楽しい気持ちもまったくなく、グランティスのときと同じ横柄な口調に戻っていた。{/n}「お前は以前禁じられた知識…古代アエルダリの真の継承者の道を知りたいと言っていたな。俺の世界の本質だ。普通のモン＝ケイには触れられない。俺を悦ばせてくれるもの。こう言わないといけないらしい…お前はひどく劣った教え子だよ」

languages.text: {n}La voz de Marazhai está totalmente desprovista de color y alegría; ha vuelto a adquirir el mismo tono imperioso que le oíste en Grantis.{/n} «Una vez dijiste que buscabas conocimientos prohibidos: las sendas de los auténticos herederos de los antiguos Aeldari. La esencia de mi mundo. Cosas inalcanzables para los mon-keigh ordinarios. Cosas que me son placenteras. Y debo decir que has demostrado ser {mf|un|una} estudiante de abominable mediocridad».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's voice is utterly devoid of colour and playfulness — he has reverted to the same imperious tone you heard back on Grantis.{/n} "You once wanted to gain forbidden knowledge — the paths of the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The essence of my world. Things that are inaccessible to ordinary mon-keigh. Things that bring me pleasure. And, I must say, you have proved to be an abominably poor student."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Marazhai está totalmente desprovista de color y alegría; ha vuelto a adquirir el mismo tono imperioso que le oíste en Grantis.{/n} «Una vez dijiste que buscabas conocimientos prohibidos: las sendas de los auténticos herederos de los antiguos Aeldari. La esencia de mi mundo. Cosas inalcanzables para los mon-keigh ordinarios. Cosas que me son placenteras. Y debo decir que has demostrado ser {mf|un|una} estudiante de abominable mediocridad».

languages.text: {n}La voix de Marazhai a perdu les accents colorés et espiègles qu'elle avait pris dernièrement. Il a renoué avec le ton impérieux que vous lui connaissiez sur Grantis.{/n} « Vous avez demandé à accéder à un savoir interdit, à connaître la voie des véritables héritiers des anciens Aeldaris. L'essence même de mon monde. Autant de choses, d'ordinaire inaccessibles aux vulgaires mon-keigh, qui m'ouvrent les portes de la volupté suprême. Or, force m'est de constater que vous faites {mf|un|une} élève des plus médiocres. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's voice is utterly devoid of colour and playfulness — he has reverted to the same imperious tone you heard back on Grantis.{/n} "You once wanted to gain forbidden knowledge — the paths of the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The essence of my world. Things that are inaccessible to ordinary mon-keigh. Things that bring me pleasure. And, I must say, you have proved to be an abominably poor student."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Marazhai a perdu les accents colorés et espiègles qu'elle avait pris dernièrement. Il a renoué avec le ton impérieux que vous lui connaissiez sur Grantis.{/n} « Vous avez demandé à accéder à un savoir interdit, à connaître la voie des véritables héritiers des anciens Aeldaris. L'essence même de mon monde. Autant de choses, d'ordinaire inaccessibles aux vulgaires mon-keigh, qui m'ouvrent les portes de la volupté suprême. Or, force m'est de constater que vous faites {mf|un|une} élève des plus médiocres. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Stimme klingt völlig farblos und zeigt keinerlei Verspieltheit – er legt den gleichen herrischen Ton an den Tag, den du schon auf Grantis gehört hat.{/n} "Ihr wolltet an verbotenes Wissen kommen – die Wege der wahren Erben der alten Aeldari erlernen. Die Essenz meiner Welt. Dinge, die gewöhnlichen Chem-Pan-Sey versagt bleiben. Dinge, die mir Vergnügen bereiten. Und ich muss sagen, Ihr habt Euch dabei als {mf|fürchterlicher Schüler|fürchterliche Schülerin} erwiesen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's voice is utterly devoid of colour and playfulness — he has reverted to the same imperious tone you heard back on Grantis.{/n} "You once wanted to gain forbidden knowledge — the paths of the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The essence of my world. Things that are inaccessible to ordinary mon-keigh. Things that bring me pleasure. And, I must say, you have proved to be an abominably poor student."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Stimme klingt völlig farblos und zeigt keinerlei Verspieltheit – er legt den gleichen herrischen Ton an den Tag, den du schon auf Grantis gehört hat.{/n} "Ihr wolltet an verbotenes Wissen kommen – die Wege der wahren Erben der alten Aeldari erlernen. Die Essenz meiner Welt. Dinge, die gewöhnlichen Chem-Pan-Sey versagt bleiben. Dinge, die mir Vergnügen bereiten. Und ich muss sagen, Ihr habt Euch dabei als {mf|fürchterlicher Schüler|fürchterliche Schülerin} erwiesen."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın sesi, renkten ve oyunbazlıktan tamamen yoksun. Grantis'te duyduğun otoriter ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n} "Bir vakitler yasaklı irfanı, kadim Aeldarilerin hakiki vârislerinin yollarını keşfetmek istemiştin. Dünyamın özünü, sıradan mon-keighlerin erişemeyeceği şeyleri, bana zevk veren şeyleri... İtiraf etmem gerekir ki tiksindirici derecede kötü bir öğrenci olduğun ortaya çıktı."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's voice is utterly devoid of colour and playfulness — he has reverted to the same imperious tone you heard back on Grantis.{/n} "You once wanted to gain forbidden knowledge — the paths of the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The essence of my world. Things that are inaccessible to ordinary mon-keigh. Things that bring me pleasure. And, I must say, you have proved to be an abominably poor student."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın sesi, renkten ve oyunbazlıktan tamamen yoksun. Grantis'te duyduğun aynı otoriter ses tonuna dönüyor.{/n} "Bir vakitler yasaklı irfanı, kadim Aeldarilerin hakiki vârislerinin yollarını keşfetmek istemiştin. Dünyamın özünü, sıradan mon-keighlerin erişemeyeceği şeyleri, bana zevk veren şeyleri... İtiraf etmem gerekir ki tiksindirici derecede kötü bir öğrenci olduğun ortaya çıktı."
